description: How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?
teaser: How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?
contentencoded:
It's time for Silicon Tally! How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?

This week, we're joined by Anna Sale, host of WNYC's "Death, Sex & Money," a podcast about the big questions and hard choices that are often left out of polite conversation.
title: Silicon Tally: Death, Sext, and Digital Money
